verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, unto the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

We are <S%G3784>bound<s%> to give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G514>meet<s%>, for <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> groweth <S%G5232>exceedingly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G4121>aboundeth<s%>;

so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in the <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G430>endure<s%>;

which is a manifest <S%G1730>token<s%> of the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; to the end <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> may be counted <S%G2661>worthy<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3958>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%>:
if so <S%G1512>be<s%> that it is righteous <S%G1342>thing<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G467>recompense<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> to them that <S%G2346>afflict<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> that are <S%G2346>afflicted<s%> <S%G425>rest<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5395>flaming<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>,

rendering <S%G1325><s%> <S%G1557>vengeance<s%> to them that <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to them that <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>:

who <S%G3748><s%> shall suffer <S%G5099>punishment<s%>, even <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2479>might<s%>,

when <S%G3752><s%> he shall <S%G2064>come<s%> to be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G2296>marvelled<s%> at <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3754>(because<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> was <S%G4100>believed<s%>) <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

To <S%G1519>which<s%> end we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may <S%G515>count<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> <S%G2821>of<s%> your <S%G2821>calling<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4137>fulfil<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> desire <S%G19>of<s%> <S%G19>goodness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> every <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G19>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>;

that <S%G3704><s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> may be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
